badges.name: My first day as astro-rookie!
badges.info: given by joining to astronomy guild

badges.name: First NEA discovered!
badges.info: given by discovering your first near-earth asteroid

badges.name: First NEC discovered!
badges.info: given by discovering your first near-earth comet

badges.name: Road to NE-lhalla!
badges.info: given by discovering 5 Objects between NEAs and NECs

badges.name: Master of universe!
badges.info: given by discovering 10 Objects between NEAs and NECs

badges.name: The best astronomer!
badges.info: given by obtaining all previous badges
